name: Colored Level Names
description: This mod colors your level names.

Enable/disable Features.name: Enable/disable Features
Enable/disable Features.description: Enable and disable features of this mod.

Change Title of Levels.name: Change Title of Levels
Change Title of Levels.description: Change the color of level names when you open them.

Change Title of Lists.name: Change Title of Lists
Change Title of Lists.description: Change the color of list names when you open them.

Change Title of LevelCells.name: Change Title of LevelCells
Change Title of LevelCells.description: Change the color of level names when you search.

Change Title of List LevelCells.name: Change Title of List LevelCells
Change Title of List LevelCells.description: Change the color of list names.

Change Title of InfoLayer.name: Change Title of InfoLayer
Change Title of InfoLayer.description: Change the color of the title in the 'more info' popup in a level or list. THIS USES THE RECOMMENDED DIFFICULTY, NOT THE CURRENT DIFFICULTY. IT MAY BE THE WRONG DIFFICULTY.

Main Difficulties Title.name: Main Difficulties
Main Difficulties Title.description: These are the colors used for normal difficulty level titles, like easy or harder.

Easy Level Color.name: Easy Level Color
Easy Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Easy.

Normal Level Color.name: Normal Level Color
Normal Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Normal.

Hard Level Color.name: Hard Level Color
Hard Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Hard.

Harder Level Color.name: Harder Level Color
Harder Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Harder.

Insane Level Color.name: Insane Level Color
Insane Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Insane.

Demon Difficulties Title.name: Demon Difficulties
Demon Difficulties Title.description: These are the colors used for demon level titles, like easy demon or insane demon.

Easy Demon Level Color.name: Easy Demon Level Color
Easy Demon Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Easy Demon.

Medium Demon Level Color.name: Medium Demon Level Color
Medium Demon Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Medium Demon.

Hard Demon Level Color.name: Hard Demon Level Color
Hard Demon Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Hard Demon.

Insane Demon Level Color.name: Insane Demon Level Color
Insane Demon Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Insane Demon.

Extreme Demon Level Color.name: Extreme Demon Level Color
Extreme Demon Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Extreme Demon.

Other Difficulties Title.name: Other Difficulties
Other Difficulties Title.description: These are the colors used for other level titles, like N/A levels.

N/A Level Color.name: N/A Level Color
N/A Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of N/A.

Auto Level Color.name: Auto Level Color
Auto Level Color.description: The color used in level titles with the difficulty of Auto.
